segments.advisor_message: Now, let's discuss your dependents. Can you please provide the full name of your dependent?
segments.client_message: Yes, of course. My dependent's name is Emily Johnson.

segments.advisor_message: Thank you, and when was Emily born? I need her date of birth to complete the records.
segments.client_message: She was born on the 15th of May, 2015.

segments.advisor_message: Perfect, and just to clarify, until when will Emily be considered a dependent? This helps us assess your situation accurately.
segments.client_message: She'll be considered a dependent until she turns 18, so that would be until May 15, 2033.
